58212.affected_area: Steinbach (Between Kroeker Ave and Hershfeld rd)
live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 12:13 CT.
58212.summary: Some customers in the Between Kroeker Ave and Hershfeld rd area of Steinbach are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58212.title: Feb 23 - Steinbach (Between Kroeker Ave and Hershfeld rd) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
